question: Match the following. Festival State 1. Gangaur a.West Bengal 2.Ganesh Chaturthi b.Rajasthan 3. Durga Puja c.Maharashtra
explanation: Gangaur is a festival celebrated in the Indian state of Rajasthan. Ganesh Chaturthi is one of the most revered festivals all over Maharashtra. Durga Puja is the largest festival of Bengalis as well as of West Bengal.
